publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4044 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to Scottish Ministers) (No.2) Order 2006—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to Scottish Ministers) (No.2) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*

S2M-4044 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to Scottish Ministers) (No.2) Order 2006—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to Scottish Ministers) (No.2) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson
